source:
## 지역별_ 연령 기준 인구 분포 파악

 1.서울
 2.부산
 3.대구
 4.인천
 5.광주
 6.대전
 7.울산
 8.세종
 9.경기
 10.강원
 11.충북
 12.충남
 13.전북
 14.전남
 15.경북
 16.경남
 17.제주

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
plt.rc('font',family='Malgun Gothic')
#df=pd.read_csv('C:/Users/ns451/Downloads/202103.csv')
from google.colab import drive
drive.mount('/content/drive')

df=pd.DataFrame(df)
df.set_index('Unnamed: 0',inplace=True)
df=df.transpose()

df['new_1']=df.index
df['new_1'][2:]=df['new_1'][2:].str[7:10]
df.set_index(df['new_1'],inplace=True)
df.drop(columns='new_1',inplace=True)
df['age']=df.index
df.reset_index(inplace=True)
df.drop(columns='new_1',inplace=True)
df.columns

df['total']=df['total'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['seoul']=df['seoul'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['busan']=df['busan'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['daegu']=df['daegu'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['incheon']=df['incheon'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['gwangju']=df['gwangju'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['daejeon']=df['daejeon'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['ulsan']=df['ulsan'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['kyonggi']=df['kyonggi'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['gangwon']=df['gangwon'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['chungbuk']=df['chungbuk'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['chungnam']=df['chungnam'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['jeollabuk']=df['jeollabuk'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['jeollanam']=df['jeollanam'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['gyeongbuk']=df['gyeongbuk'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['gyeongnam']=df['gyeongnam'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['jeju']=df['jeju'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df['sejong']=df['sejong'].replace(',','',regex=True).astype('int')
df=df.drop([df.columns[0]],axis=1)
df=df.drop(index=0,axis=0)
df=df.drop(index=1,axis=0)
df

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['seoul'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('서울 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['busan'],label=df['age'],color='green')
a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('부산 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['daegu'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('대구 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['incheon'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('인천 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['gwangju'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('광주 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['ulsan'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('울산 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['sejong'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('세종 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['kyonggi'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('경기 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['gangwon'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('강원 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['chungbuk'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('충청북도 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['chungnam'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('충청남도 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['jeollanam'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('전라남도 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['jeollabuk'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('전라북도 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['gyeongbuk'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('경상북도 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['gyeongnam'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('경상남도 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()

fig,ax=plt.subplots()
index=np.arange(len(df['age']))
plt.bar(index,df['jeju'],label=df['age'],color='green')

a=df['age'].tolist()
position=list(range(len(a)))
plt.xticks(position,a)
plt.title('제주도 연령별 인구 분포')
plt.xlabel('연령')
plt.ylabel('인구')
plt.show()
